subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Zdeno Chara of the Boston Bruins broke Al Iafrate’s 16-year-old record for the hardest shot during the N.H.L. All-Star SuperSkills competition in Montreal. His slap shot registered 105.4 miles per hour.
snippet: Zdeno Chara of the Boston Bruins broke Al Iafrate’s 16-year-old record for the hardest shot during the N.H.L. All-Star SuperSkills competition in Montreal. His slap shot registered 105.4 miles per hour.
